statements: SELECT * FROM discounts_and_promotions;
SELECT discount_id, product_id, discount_amount FROM discounts_and_promotions WHERE customer_segment = 'VIP';
SELECT * FROM discounts_and_promotions WHERE product_id = 101 ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT MAX(discount_amount) AS highest_discount FROM discounts_and_promotions;
SELECT customer_segment, COUNT(*) AS total_discounts FROM discounts_and_promotions GROUP BY customer_segment;
SELECT * FROM discounts_and_promotions WHERE discount_amount > 100 ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC
SELECT discount_id, product_id, customer_segment, start_date, end_date FROM discounts_and_promotions WHERE customer_segment = 'VIP'
SELECT discount_id, product_id, customer_segment, end_date FROM discounts_and_promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_segment, SUM(discount_amount) AS total_discount FROM discounts_and_promotions GROUP BY customer_segment HAVING total_discount > 500 ORDER BY total_discount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_segment FROM discounts_and_promotions ORDER BY customer_segment
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, discount FROM products WHERE discount IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 30 AND 70;
SELECT product_name, price, discount FROM products WHERE discount > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, discount FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE discount IS NULL ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price * (1 - discount_rate) AS discounted_price FROM products CROSS JOIN customer_segments WHERE product_id = segment_id AND discount_rate > 0.1;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' AND price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT name, price FROM products;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE discount > 0;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM products GROUP BY category ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT id, name, type, discount FROM promotions WHERE type = 'Seasonal';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT id, name FROM customers WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE type = 'Percentage' AND discount >= 0.25
SELECT id, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM promotions;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT product_name, product_price, discount_percentage FROM products JOIN discounts ON products.product_id = discounts.discount_id;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE promotion_description LIKE '%limited time%' AND promotion_name LIKE '%sale%';
SELECT MAX(product_price) AS highest_price, MIN(product_price) AS lowest_price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_percentage FROM promotions WHERE discount_percentage BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT segment_name FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%Tech%' AND price < 500;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_name;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, pr.promotion_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN products p ON c.customer_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN promotions pr ON p.product_id = pr.promotion_id ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC, p.product_name DESC, pr.promotion_name;
